function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Air quality failing who guidelines in urban areas","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of specific actions in the nua regarding health and the built environment","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of awareness on the link between demolition waste management and risk of vbds","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Urbanization leading to increased impact on health","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Buildings constructed with favorable sites for mosquito larvae to mature.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of indoor air quality and human comfort on the risk of malaria in retrofits, repairs, and building modifications.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sharing proper techniques for installation and appropriate materials for piping to ensure long risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor iaq can increase the risk of respiratory diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reduced air exchanges due to modified building openings can lead to increased outdoor time and higher risk of mosquito exposure in malarious areas.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of close synergies with built environment professionals during building envelope modifications can compromise indoor air quality.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unfavorable conditions for humans due to changes in building openings","category":"Infrastructural risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Leakage from temporary risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Malaria-causing mosquitoes access buildings through inlets and outlets, designed for air exchange","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in global wind patterns and increased rainfall propagate the spread of malaria","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased
